message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,300,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I'm looking to stay within a budget of $800,000. Considering the product's value, I'm willing to offer $1,200,000. I believe this is a reasonable compromise.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $1,200,000 is significantly below its true value and potential.  I'm willing to come down to $2,000,000.  I believe this price point reflects the value it will bring to your business.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Considering your latest offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,500,000. This is the highest I can go, and I hope you can understand my position.
